mapper.select: SELECT i_id, i_bus_model_id, i_bus_function_id, i_order, s_name, s_doc_rule, i_doc_num, i_utemplate_id, i_dtemplate_id, i_atemplate_id, s_remarks, s_create_by, d_create_time, s_update_by, d_update_time FROM oa_docnum WHERE i_id = #{id}
SELECT i_id,i_bus_model_id,s_name FROM oa_bus_function where i_bus_model_id = #{ibusModelId}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(s_dept_id) FROM oa_docnum_dept WHERE i_docnum_id = #{docId}
SELECT id, depart_name FROM sys_depart WHERE id in (${depIdList})

SELECT od.i_id, od.s_name FROM oa_docnum as od LEFT JOIN oa_docnum_dept as op ON op.i_docnum_id = od.i_id WHERE od.i_bus_function_id = #{iBusFunctionId} AND (op.s_dept_id = "" OR op.s_dept_id = #{sDeptId})
